questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the predominant shape of this upholstered furniture piece?
What is the most apparent color of the fabric covering the sofa's entire surface?
Based on visual texture, what is the likely fabric type of the sofa's upholstery?
Examining the sofa's structure, how many distinct seating sections can be visually identified?
Describe the form of the armrests, considering their height and design integration with the main body.
What is the apparent material of the sofa's legs, judging by their color and general appearance?
Focusing on the seams and stitching, what can be said about the overall visual quality of the craftsmanship?
Considering the backrest's height relative to the seat cushions, what is its descriptive profile?
Describe the style of the sofa's cushions, from an observational perspective of their plumpness and form.
Observing the armrests' juncture with the sofa's main body, describe their style of attachment.
Considering the upholstery's apparent feel, describe the visible texture, paying attention to its uniformity.
Describe the style of the sofa’s legs in relation to its overall design and weight.
Describe the overall design aesthetic, paying attention to the simplicity of its lines and form.
Based on the appearance of the fabric, describe its visual pattern or lack thereof.
Describe the visible features of the sofa's base, noting any significant details such as feet or supports.
